Articles.Content: I was glancing through my emails and noticed that KerbalSP had a stream yesterday. I can't watch it right now, and will not be able to for awhile. So I was just wondering if someone could give me a quick update on what they talked about yesterday
Nothing about 0.20. It was a little Tutorial for the Beginners by Skunky. And an anouncement for a streaming plan for the community by June.

Just watched the beginning, clicked through the tutorial stuff.

Mostly Skunky talking about where the stream is going. Sounds like the plan is to launch a channel with an official KSP program, and a set schedule of community streamers doing their own shows. Really, it sounds like an awesome idea. I think maybe Skunky focused a little bit too much on the minutia of application process and the details of programming instead of just doing a promo for it, but that was probably what he's been knee deep in for the past couple weeks. Makes sense he'd talk about those aspects.

I'm looking forward to it.
I'm watching it now, i missed it when it was live sadly.
